meanings.sent1: The white shirt is dyeable, so I can change its color.
meanings.sent2: She bought a dyeable fabric to make a colorful dress.
meanings.sent3: The dyeable socks turned bright pink after a laundry mishap.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, normally dyeable, now reflected the vibrant hues of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The dyeable flowers in the garden added a splash of color to the landscape.

meanings.definition: Able to be colored with dye.
meanings.sent1: The dyeable curtains matched perfectly with the room's decor.
meanings.sent2: The dyeable yarn allowed her to create a rainbow scarf.
meanings.sent3: The dyeable Easter eggs turned out to be a fun and messy project.
meanings.sent4: The dyeable water in the fountain shimmered with different hues.
meanings.sent5: The dyeable paper absorbed the colors beautifully, creating a stunning artwork.
